row.field:
Dear %user.name_f% %user.name_l%,
An account has been created for you on %site_title%!
Your User ID: %user.login% Your Password: %password%
Log-on to use your subscription %root_url%/member
-- Best Regards, %site_title% %root_url%

Dear %user.name_f% %user.name_l%,
%reseller.name_f% %reseller.name_l% invite you to join his account. You can accept this invite in your account %root_url%/member
-- Best Regards, %site_title% %root_url%
